A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I grew up with Star Wars\, starting with the remasters in the 90s. I was able to enjoy the prequels quite much. I could not enjoy this. Say what you will about Lucas's final three efforts\, but this was a disappointment from the beginning. The redeeming qualities\, ie. the Guard fight\, female badassery\, were so far out numbered by the incohesive narrative\, tonally off-putting attempts at humor\, and poor writing that I will find it very hard to watch again.
